title: Saturday PM Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
CLASSIC GARRISON Episode 7: Bernanke Bad Santa

CHUCK DIXON PRESENTS: MYSTERY Episode 9: The Facts in the Case of M. Valdemar

Jon Del Arroz observes that DC Comics is imitating Arktoons, albeit in an ineffective manner, in his latest video: Is DC Comics COPYING Vox Day’s Arktoons?
